content:
VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical Class

Definition

Provides a VisualStyleElement for a single tick of a vertical track bar. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public static class VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical
Inheritance
Object
VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object, Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object, Object)
ToString()

Examples

The following code example demonstrates how to create a VisualStyleRenderer with the VisualStyleElement returned by the Normal property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the formâ€™s Paint event and call the DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarTicksVertical1 method from the Paint event-handling method, passing e as PaintEventArgs. 

public void DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarTicksVertical1(PaintEventArgs e)
{
    if (VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined(
        VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal))
    {
        VisualStyleRenderer renderer =
             new VisualStyleRenderer(VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal);
        Rectangle rectangle1 = new Rectangle(10, 50, 50, 50);
        renderer.DrawBackground(e.Graphics, rectangle1);
        e.Graphics.DrawString("VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal",
             this.Font, Brushes.Black, new Point(10, 10));
    }
    else
        e.Graphics.DrawString("This element is not defined in the current visual style.",
             this.Font, Brushes.Black, new Point(10, 10));
}

Public Sub DrawVisualStyleElementTrackBarTicksVertical1(ByVal e As PaintEventArgs)
    If (VisualStyleRenderer.IsElementDefined( _
     VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal)) Then
        Dim renderer As New VisualStyleRenderer _
          (VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal)
        Dim rectangle1 As New Rectangle(10, 50, 50, 50)
        renderer.DrawBackground(e.Graphics, rectangle1)
        e.Graphics.DrawString("VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical.Normal", _
          Me.Font, Brushes.Black, New Point(10, 10))
    Else
        e.Graphics.DrawString("This element is not defined in the current visual style.", _
          Me.Font, Brushes.Black, New Point(10, 10))
    End If
End Sub

Remarks

The Normal property of the VisualStyleElement.TrackBar.TicksVertical class returns a VisualStyleElement that represents a single tick of a vertical track bar.

Properties

Normal

Gets a visual style element that represents a single tick of a vertical track bar.

public static System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement Normal { get; }
Value
VisualStyleElement

A VisualStyleElement that represents a single tick of a vertical track bar.

Remarks

You can use the VisualStyleElement returned by the Normal property to create a VisualStyleRenderer.
